DOC.brief_summary: This primary purpose study assess efficacy safety Effexor XR prevent recurrence Chinese patient recurrent major depressive disorder ( MDD ) follow 1-year maintenance treatment 8-week acute treatment 6-month continuation treatment phase . The study also collect data prevalence pattern co-morbid anxiety somatic symptom impact recurrence depression .
DOC.brief_title: Study Evaluating Effexor XR Chinese Subjects With Major Depressive Disorder
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : 1 . Males female , 18 year age ; 2 . Outpatients ; 3 . Major depressive disorder base DSMIV criterion , with/without current comorbid anxiety disorder ; 4 . Has two episode depression ( include current episode ) past 5 year , interval lease 2 month end previous episode begin current episode . 5 . The baseline score 17item Hamilton Rating Scale Depression ( HAMD ) > =17 ; 6 If female childbearing potential , negative urine pregnancy test baseline , appropriate , use medically acceptable method contraception throughout study . Exclusion criteria:1.Hypersensitivity venlafaxine ; 2.Received venlafaxine treatment ; 3.Clinically significant renal hepatic disease medical disease , opinion investigator , might compromise study , include seizure disorder ( exception single childhood febrile seizure ) ; 4.Alcohol drug abuse within last year ; 5.A recent history myocardial infarction unstable heart disease ( within 6 month baseline ) ; 6.Bipolar disorder ; 7.For female , know suspected pregnancy breast feeding ; 8.Use monoamine oxidize inhibitor ( MAOI ) within 14 day baseline ; use investigational drug within 30 day baseline .
